extendedInfo.description: Do you enjoy a good beer every now and again? Then one day you're sitting at the bar, trying to figure out whether or not you tried that beer before, only to later find out that you have indeed tried it and hated it! Now we have a solution just keep track of all those beers you love, and all the ones you love to hate! If you want to record more than the basics, or simply want to thank us for the hard work and time put into this app. Then please purchase the full version it has more features, and will be updated with user requests over time!Free version lets you record:- Beer Name- Brewer- Color- Personal comments- RatingCheck out the full version for even more great features!Keywords:beer, beer journal, beer notes, beer reviews, beer app, beer tracker, beers, beer ratings, beer saver, beer dossier, beer book, beer taster, beer tastes, beer box, beer holderAll logos/bottles/names are copyright of their perspective owners. This image is not endorsed by any of the perspective owners, and the images are used simply for aesthetic purposes. No copyright infringement is intended, and any request to remove one of the bottles/logos/names will be honored.

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Full version might be worth it, but everything in free version is locked for full version only, so....... Its an app, but you can\'t do abutting unless you buy? Pointless!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Great app, love how in the free version you can name your beer and put color info and additional notes about the beer. Great when I have a good beer and can look it up later when I\'m debating what beer to get at the store.
reviews.author: Lindsey Woodward

reviews.title: CRASH!!!
reviews.comment: It is everything I want except it crashes nearly every time I enter info.
reviews.author: SCOTT NELSON

reviews.title: Free version useless
reviews.comment: The free version is useless. I might pay for the full version, if the free version actually gave me a taste of what it can do. For now. I\'m uninstalling it.
reviews.author: A Google User
